problem_text: (B. Hartley). Is it true that a locally soluble periodic group has a finite normal series with locally nilpotent factors if it contains an element ∗a) with finite centralizer? b) with Chernikov centralizer? V. V. Belyaev
answer: ∗a) Yes, it is true (E. Khukhro, to appear in Bull. London Math. Soc., 2025, http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.20999).
